channel.title: Unity on Jameson Thai
channel.description: Recent content in Unity on Jameson Thai

item.title: Cooking Journey
item.description: A mobile game inspired by Overcooked, Cooking Mama and DoorDash/Uber Eats created in Unity. Goals Build Resturant Scene. Build Driving Scenes. Link scenes. Deploy on Ios and Android. Develop in game currency system and usage. Unity Status Completed December 2019
